text:
Aur marde!! kaisan baa...

Bhai tu one of the best thing hai jo D club me mere saath hua. First year me jb hum dono seniors ko dekhkr sikhte the tb me socha bhi ni tha ki ye duo 4 saal tak rahega. Tere jitta passionate aur dedicated person bs mene mirror me dekha hai xD. Shayad me itta jada choreo bnane me involved bhi na hua hota agr tere jitta interested aadmi saath na hota. Tere andar mene hamesha wo qualities dekhi hai jo me khudme acquire krna chahta hoon, shayad isiliye itta admire krta hoon tujhe. Bhai tera sense of humour bohot great hai and you have great skills with word comedy. Bs ek baat ka dukh rahega, itte choreos bnaye saath pr ek bhi video shoot ni kiye :(

Kabhi kabhi lagta mereko ki tu khudko bohot underestimate krta. 
Mat bhool bro ek BIHARI sab par BHAARI.
author: Akash  Kumar

text:
Bhai tere jitna friendly aur warm hearted person ni mila mereko aajtak. Tere se hamesha me free hokr baat krta tha me aur bhai poore campus me tere room jitta neat and organized room ni dekha xD.
Aur chaapu to tu hai hi bohot jada
Love you bro (sent with heart effect).
author: Akash  Kumar

text:
Mera pyaara bhola paaki, teri tarakki se seena chauda hogya hai (you know the reason bro xD). Apne group ka bakchod bboy hai tu bro, aur Galaxy me jo tune perform kiya tha wo hamesha yaad rahega. Bs bich me tereko pelne ka man krta tha jab tu humlogo se dur bhagta tha :(

Bhai tu pehla londa tha jisko mene apne life me pehli baar chaturbate pe bakchodi krte dekha tha, aur fake id bnakr bohot chutiya bnaya hai bhai tune D club me xD. Aise hi hasi khushi ka chhota packet bnkr rehna bro. Bs last time mote paaki ka dance dekhna reh gya :(

Rahi baat mom jokes ki to bhulna ni mere paas abhi bhi screenshot hai tera xD. 
Apni mummy ko meri taraf se namaste bolna xD.
author: Akash  Kumar

text:
Londe..... tere bhai ki izzat ka sawaal hai....

I will never forget this line because whenever I was in trouble I used to call you. You are my "Vighnaharta". It doesn't matter what time it is or location you were there by my side and that's a kind of friendship we don't make.. it is earned. So, thanks for being there for me and I am sure, we will always be like this.

Apart from that, all those crazy things like listening to "zeher songs" on youtube and watching cringy videos while we were studying made the exam preparation less depressing. I remember we talked with each other first time frankly when we stalked most of the people of the campus ("May Allah!! forgive us for the act") was really an icebreaker between us. It's great to have an upbringing friend like you around who not only motivates himself but also others to act right. 

Dance sikha dunga tereko chinta ni krna
First year me hi Mech ka hokr bhi naari see nata that tera, 
You were too cool for us bro...
Dance sikhne ke baad, aur cool ho jayega..
You will drop it, like it's hot....
author: Akash  Kumar

text:
Bhaiya me bhaiya, Chandra bhaiya!!!
Bhai teri wo backchodiya aur badass bnne ki koshish waali harkatein bohot mast lgti hai, wo awaaj bhaari krke baat krna aur Alpha male bnna hamesha se grp ka maahol bnati hai. Teri sbse acchi quality jise me admire krta hoon wo different logon ko handle krne ki capability hai, jo sbke paas ni hoti. Milkr gaand faad party krenge.
Gym jaakr mast body bna liya hai tu,
Ekdum Guddu bhaiya lgta xD.
author: Akash  Kumar

text:
Gujju bhaii (yha wo ni likhunga xD) !!
Bhai tere jaisa dildaar aadmi ni dekha. Doston nibhana aur support krna literally tere se koi sikhe. D club chod diya tha tune pr phir bhi jb bhi milta tha kabhi bhi aisa ni lgta tha ki saath ni apne tu. Tere se baat krke hamesha khush hota hoon me, hamesha aise hi mast maula rehna. Aaj bhi mereko tera wo first year ke dance wala body wave aur half split yaad krke bohot maza aata hai xD.
Last time milna reh gya apna campus me,
Pr dobara zaroor milenge aur faad party krenge!!
author: Akash  Kumar

text:
Bhai heera aadmi hai tu, bohot kam hote hai wo log jo dil ki baatein mooh pr bolte bina kisi chhal ya kapat ke. Tere jaisa deep insaan pehli baar dekha hai mene, kyuki har baar tu apni baaton se surprise kr deta tha mujhe. Dil ka saaf hai tu isiliye iss dil ke paas hai tu. D club ki party ki jaan tha bhai tu, tere saath bhand hokr naachne me bohot maza aata hai. Bhai teri kahaniyan bohot mazedaar hoti thi, khaaskr Bihaari ki kahaniyan xD. Sabse bakchod apni movie nights hoti thi, do darpok log saath me horror dekhkr chillate the bc. Wo din me kabhi ni bhulunga, jb tu room se chillate hue bhaga tha ye bolte hue ki Rawat nanga hogya xD. 

Bhai milkr aur bakchodi karenge aise hi :)
author: Akash  Kumar

text:
Bhai first year me hi apan bhai ban gye the, wing ke most of the bakchod moments aur mere meme contents there hi paas hai (pls leak na kariyo xD). Hum dono most of the time apne kaam me busy rehte the pr jb bhi dance se thak kr aata tha mujhe yaad hai tu room pr hamesha aata tha agr me jaga hua hoon to. Tere wing biryaani party aur Id pr ghr jana bohot accha lgta hai. Intern ke time tune bohot help ki thi meri jb me pareshaan tha jo me bohot appreciate krta hoon. Bhai tu to bola tha bandi ni bnayega xD. Aise hi bhabhi ko khush rakhna aur milte rehna.
Love you bro !!
author: Akash  Kumar

text:
Bhai first year se jo saath paya tera har cheez me wo hamesha yaad rahega. Start ke first year me jb tu pareshaan hokr londiyon jaise bolta tha, wo bada funny lgta tha xD. Waise 4 saal beet gye lekin aaj bhi irritate hokr londiyon jaise hi bolta hai tu xD. Bhai terese bohot kuch seekha hai jo me mostly ignore krta tha ya apne introvert behaviour ke karan unme involved ni rehna chahta tha. Pehli baar daaru tune pilaii thi broo (sent with gili chummi effect)
Kaash me yha tere aur gavish ki intimate baat likh pata xD
Yrr last time milna reh gya apna campus me :(

P.S. Chummi dede bro....
author: Akash  Kumar

text:
"Aiee madarchod"

Teri baat hote hi ye awaaj meri kaano me goonj uthti hai xD. 1st year se jo saath raha apna wo hamesha yaad rahega. Tere jokes aur savage moments create krke group hangouts ko awesome bnana is one of the best things about you. Bhai bhand hokr kya video bnaye the humlog ek baar, jisko tu dikha aya tha galat jagah xD. Jaipur trip me bohot maza aaya, parathe bhi mast the bro...

Bhai bs ek tere saath breaking ki choreo bnani reh gii :(
Aur akele hangout bhi krna reh gya xD
Hold on to that Gavishism...
author: Akash  Kumar

text:
Bhai tere jaisa active londa mene pehli baar dekha hai. Koi bhi kissa ya kaand ho Arjav Modi ka naam jaroor sunta tha me xD. Pr bhai please apne jokes pr kaam kr, bohot dardnaak jokes hote the tere, itte jada dardnaak ki hasta aadmi serious ho jaaye xD. 

Stay blessed bro !!
I hope you get what you wish for in your life
Har har Modi, ghar ghar Modi xD
author: Akash  Kumar

text:
Mithooo miyaa !!
Bahut chaapu aadmi hai bhai tu, tune campus me har chiz enjoy ki aur saath me life me bhi chaapa. Pr tera wo har baat ka randi rona hamesha yaad rahega mujhe xD. Teri wo bachkaani harkatein hamesha funny lgti hai mujhe, isnhi ke karan gopiya marti hai tere pe, bhola bnkr gola khaa leta xD. Bhai Presi to tereko bnna tha me jo tere saath khada tha xD. Tu D club me ek saal aur raha hota to panda tere ko chhod diya hota literally xD, dostana bna liya tha tere saath wo.
Aisa hi sweet bne rehna (sent with chummi effect)
author: Akash  Kumar

text:
Chacha se chikne ka safar krna koi tere se sikhe bro xD. Pehli baar terese 2nd year me mila tha buzzer round me, tb socha bhi ni tha ki itte acche dost ban jayenge hum. Tu hath ke upar hath ni dekha hota to prem ki shuruaat bhi ni huii hoti meri xD. Yaad hai, bajar batti ke quiz se pehle bakchodi me satwe aasman pr chale gye the aur phir lode lag gye xD. Apne Y17 D club ka pehla londa tha tu jo grihasti ke khoote se bandh gya, jisse baaki londo ko motivation mila. Bahut hi pyaara aadmi hai tu, bhai bs desh chodkr mat jana warna milunga kaise terse :(

Waise flat earth society waale terse kaafi jealous rehte xD
Aur sutta chod de bsdk
author: Akash  Kumar

text:
Arabiannn nightsssss, gajabbb kaaa yeee deshhhhhhhh........ xD
Bhai tere jitta mast aadmi ni mila mujhe campus me, wo saare chutiyape first year ke aur tera massage bakchod hota tha xD. Start me tere se do mint baat krke hi lg gya tha ki terese bohot acchi bnne waali hai meri. Dance me busy hone ke karan utta wing me ni raha me pr jb bhi bakchodi krna ka man ho tu hi yaad aata tha. Bhai tera natural krump posture bakchod tha. Tu bhi daaru pine lga londe, kabhi mere saath bhi peena, ekdum faad denge sb. Aur bandi bna jldi, bhabhi ke charan sparsh krunga me (sent with tharki smile) xD.
Bhai ek saal bacha hai dono ka, 
saath me gadar macha denge...
author: Akash  Kumar

text:
Shasha bade jolly kisam ke aadmi ho tum, khudse hi satisfied aur kush rehte ho. Pr chaalu bohot ho tum dheere se practice me chup kr ghus aate the bina notice hue xD. Bs faaltu logo ki baaton ko saha mat kro palat kr jawaab diya kro. Bhai dedication aur focus tumhara bohot jada hai, kyuki hamne tumhe Galaxy me perform krte dekha hai aur inter-IIT me bhi, aur dono me zameen aasman ka farak tha all because of your hard work. Aise hi har jagah chaapte rehna 

BTW, your bio is flabergasting xD
author: Akash  Kumar

text:
(Rana's intense tone) Abeyy.. tumko pta hai... 

It is always obvious, what's coming after that line xD. But still, I am always impressed by your enthusiasm. I always envied you, for your capability to never back off just because you weren't prepared enough. I am glad, ki humne pehli baar ek dusre ko naam se nhi balki dance se pehchana tha. Waise aajtk mere ko ye ni samajh aaya ki saari pagliyaan tere piche hi kyu padti thi xD. Aise hi surprise krte rehna hame life me, jaise apne impromptu me krta tha.
author: Akash  Kumar
